columns.Institution_ID: The unique identifier for each sports institution.
columns.Nickname: The commonly used name for the sports institution.
columns.Joined: The year the institution joined the championship.
columns.Number_of_Championships: The total championships won by the institution.

Championship.table_description: The table tracks various sports institutions and their championship records.

columns.Institution_ID: The unique identifier for each sports institution.
columns.Name: The full name of the sports institution.
columns.Team: The name of the sports team representing the institution.
columns.City: The city where the sports institution is located.
columns.Province: The province where the sports institution operates.
columns.Founded: The year the sports institution was established.
columns.Affiliation: The type of affiliation of the sports institution.
columns.Enrollment: The total number of students enrolled in the institution.
columns.Endowment: The financial endowment of the sports institution.
columns.Stadium: The name of the stadium used by the sports institution.
columns.Capacity: The maximum number of spectators the stadium can accommodate.

institution.table_description: The table provides details about various sports institutions and their characteristics.
